## SignatureStatusConfig interface

Configuration object for changing signature status query behavior.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SignatureStatusConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [searchTransactionHistory](./web3.js.signaturestatusconfig.searchtransactionhistory.md) | boolean | Enable searching status history, not needed for recent transactions. |
